taobe.tec.jcc
Class JChineseConvertor

java.lang.Object
  taobe.tec.jcc.JChineseConvertor

public class JChineseConvertor
extends Object

A tool convert Traditional Chinese character to Simplified or vice versa. The conversion is base on Unicode, it means that if the character source is other encoding (e.g. gbk or gb2313) have to convert to Unicode before performing conversion

Author:
Joe Choi

Method Summary
static JChineseConvertor getInstance()
          Get a JChineseConvertor instance.
 Character s2t(char c)
          Convert a character from Simplified Chinese to Traditional
if the given character cannot be converted, simple return the given character
 String s2t(String s)
          Convert all the characters of given String from Simplified Chinese to Traditional
 Character t2s(char c)
          Convert a character from Traditional Chinese to Simplified.
 String t2s(String s)
          Convert all the characters of given String from Traditional Chinese to Simplified

Method Detail

getInstance

public static JChineseConvertor getInstance()
                                     throws IOException
Get a JChineseConvertor instance.

Actually, JChineseConvertor just load the Conversion Table from disk once while the first JChineseConvertor be instanced, and sequential call of the method will get a same instance

Throws:
IOException - if the conversion table cannot be loaded

t2s

t2s

if the given character cannot be converted, simple return the given character

s2t

public Character s2t(char c)
Convert a character from Simplified Chinese to Traditional
